overview: Impact Communications is not a traditional PR agency… Impact is your communications partner.Â  As Impact founder and president, I help my clients reach specific business goals by capturing the essence of their business in words, and communicating their unique value within a competitive marketplace.Â  I bring 20 years of strategic PR and communications experience to my clients, all of whom get to work directly with me.Â  That means every client of Impact Communications works with a seasoned communications expert, and is promised a commitment to superior-quality, high-level services in a very competitive fee structure.
